text: Solaris SE is a Berlin-based fintech company that provides a banking-as-a- service platform with its German banking license. It was founded in 2015 as part of Finleap and launched in March 2016.\- The company has partnerships with MasterCard and has raised funds from various investors.\- Solarisbank offers banking service modules for digital companies and financial services startups. In January 2022, the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin) of Germany ordered a special audit due to organizational deficiencies.\- == References == Category:2016 establishments in Europe Category:2010s establishments in Germany Category:Banks of Germany Category:Companies based in Berlin
title: Solarisbank
